tip.英释: a small amount of additional money that you give to someone such as a  waiter  or a taxi driver

cue.英释: an action or event that is a signal for something else to happen

sin.英释: an action that is against religious rules and is considered to be an offence against God

tow.英释: to pull a vehicle or ship along behind another vehicle, using a rope or chain

gum.中释: 用胶粘，涂以树胶；使…有粘性
gum.英释: to stick together or in place with gum

rug.中释: 小地毯；毛皮地毯；男子假发
rug.英释: a piece of thick cloth or wool that covers part of a floor, used for warmth or as a decoration

mow.英释: to cut grass using a machine

rub.英释: A massage can be referred to as a rub

pod.英释: to remove the pod or shell from (peas, beans, etc)

ego.英释: the opinion that you have about yourself

sue.中释: (Sue)人名；(日)末(名)；(法)休；(英)休(女子教名Susan、Susanna的昵称)

era.英释: a period of time in history that is known for a particular event, or for particular qualities

kid.中释: 小山羊皮制的；较年幼的

rib.英释: to furnish or support with a rib or ribs

jam.中释: 使堵塞；挤进，使塞满；混杂；压碎
jam.英释: if a lot of people or vehicles jam a place, they fill it so that it is difficult to move

PhD.中释: 博士学位；哲学博士学位（Doctor of Philosophy）

pat.英释: to lightly touch someone or something several times with your hand flat, especially to give comfort

SAP.中释: 使衰竭，使伤元气；挖掘以破坏基础

hem.英释: to turn under the edge of a piece of material or clothing and stitch it in place

hip.中释: 熟悉内情的；非常时尚的
hip.英释: doing things or done according to the latest fashion

air.英释: to let fresh air into a room, especially one that has been closed for a long time

vet.英释: someone who is trained to give medical care and treatment to sick animals

log.英释: a thick piece of wood from a tree

ale.英释: a type of beer made from  malt 1

eve.中释: 夏娃； 前夕；傍晚；重大事件关头

VIP.中释: 大人物，贵宾（Very Important Person）；视频接口处理器（Video Interface Processor）；可变信息处理（Variable Information Processing）

gin.中释: 喝杜松子酒； 用陷阱(或网)捕捉，诱捕(猎物)

eel.英释: a long thin fish that looks like a snake and can be eaten

via.英释: travelling through a place on the way to another place

use.英释: to take an amount of something from a supply of food, gas, money etc

hoe.英释: a garden tool with a long handle, used for removing  weeds (= unwanted plants )  from the surface of the soil

gut.中释: 简单的；本质的，根本的；本能的，直觉的
gut.英释: A gut feeling is based on instinct or emotion rather than reason

dye.英释: to give something a different colour using a dye

ebb.英释: if the tide ebbs, it flows away from the shore

rod.英释: a long thin pole or bar

vow.英释: If you vow to do something, you make a serious promise or decision that you will do it

ore.英释: rock or earth from which metal can be obtained

wit.英释: that is to say; namely (used to introduce statements, as in legal documents)

bid.英释: an offer to pay a particular price for something, especially at an  auction

tag.中释: 尾随，紧随；连接；起浑名；添饰

icy.中释: 冰冷的；冷淡的；结满冰的

rim.英释: to be around the edge of something

mug.英释: to make silly expressions with your face or behave in a silly way, especially for a photograph or in a play

err.中释: 犯错；做错；犯罪；走上歧途
err.英释: to be more careful or safe than is necessary, in order to make sure that nothing bad happens

ram.中释: 撞击；填塞；强迫通过或接受
ram.英释: to run or drive into something very hard

lap.英释: if water laps something or laps against something such as the shore or a boat, it moves against it or hits it in small waves

hug.英释: the action of putting your arms around someone and holding them tightly to show love or friendship

owl.中释: 猫头鹰；枭；惯于晚上活动的人
owl.英释: a bird with large eyes that hunts at night

pit.中释: 使竞争；窖藏；使凹下；去…之核；使留疤痕
pit.英释: to put small marks or holes in the surface of something

don.英释: to put on a hat, coat etc

spa.中释: 矿泉；温泉浴场；矿泉治疗地
spa.英释: a place where the water has special minerals in it, and where people go to improve their health by drinking the water or swimming in it

awe.英释: a feeling of great respect and liking for someone or something

mob.中释: 大举包围，围攻；蜂拥进入

hop.中释: 蹦跳,跳跃；跳舞；一次飞行的距离

bet.英释: to risk money on the result of a race, game, competition, or other future event

tap.英释: a piece of equipment for controlling the flow of water, gas etc from a pipe or container

fit.英释: a time when you feel an emotion very strongly and cannot control your behaviour

nun.英释: someone who is a member of a group of religious women that live together in a convent

tub.中释: 洗盆浴；（衣服等）被放在桶里洗

saw.英释: a tool that you use for cutting wood. It has a flat blade with an edge cut into many V shapes.
